Item.Line: (A guy with green hair from the audience did not clap at the end of your performance. He has a smirk on his face.)
Hey, why are you staring at us!
What is with that cocky smile?
He is probably just ignorant and does not appreciate music at all.
(The guy with green hair is not angry at all. He takes out his violin and started playing a Jazzy version of Autumn Leaves. A crowd started to gather around the teenager.)
I have a feeling he is provoking me especially. Have I met him before?
(The guy with green hair finishes playing, and the audience clapped for over a minute.)
I...will be the winner of the next International Conducting Competition, so you better remember me.
(After acknowledging the crowd, the guy with green hair left.)
Seems like you have a rival now.
That green hair reminds me of someone I know from a long time ago. I think I should follow him and see what he is up to. You should proceed without me.
